mapper.select: SELECT SEQ ,POL_CD ,POL_DISTRICT ,ROUTE_NM FROM MGMT_ROUTE_INFO MRI WHERE DEL_DATE IS NULL ORDER BY MRI.POL_DISTRICT ASC ,CAST(MRI.ROUTE_NM AS UNSIGNED) ,MRI.ROUTE_NM ASC

SELECT MRI.SEQ ,MRI.POL_CD ,MRI.POL_DISTRICT ,MRI.ROUTE_NM ,MCI.SEQ AS CROSSROAD_SEQ ,MCI.ROUTE_CD ,MCI.CROSSROAD_NM ,MCI.LAT ,MCI.LNG ,MCI.LINKED_SEQ FROM MGMT_ROUTE_INFO MRI, MGMT_CROSSROAD_INFO MCI WHERE MRI.POL_CD = MCI.POL_CD AND MRI.POL_DISTRICT = MCI.POL_DISTRICT AND MRI.SEQ = MCI.ROUTE_CD AND MRI.DEL_DATE IS NULL AND MCI.DEL_DATE IS NULL ORDER BY MRI.POL_DISTRICT ASC ,MCI.SEQ ASC

SELECT MCI.SEQ ,MCI.ROUTE_CD ,MCI.LAT ,MCI.LNG ,MCI.CROSSROAD_NM ,(SELECT INSTALL_DATE FROM MGMT_REG_INSTALL WHERE DEL_DATE IS NULL AND CROSSROAD_CD = MCI.SEQ) AS INSTALL_DATE FROM MGMT_CROSSROAD_INFO MCI WHERE SEQ = #{seq}

SELECT MAX(LAT) OVER() AS MAX_LAT ,MAX(LNG) OVER() AS MAX_LNG ,MIN(LAT) OVER() AS MIN_LAT ,MIN(LNG) OVER() AS MIN_LNG ,MCI.SEQ ,MCI.POL_CD ,MCI.POL_DISTRICT ,MCI.ROUTE_CD ,MCI.CROSSROAD_NM ,MCI.ROAD_NM ,MCI.LAT ,MCI.LNG ,MCI.LINKED_SEQ ,(SELECT INSTALL_DATE FROM MGMT_REG_INSTALL WHERE DEL_DATE IS NULL AND CROSSROAD_CD = MCI.SEQ) AS INSTALL_DATE FROM MGMT_CROSSROAD_INFO MCI WHERE MCI.DEL_DATE IS NULL AND MCI.LAT IS NOT NULL AND MCI.LNG IS NOT NULL AND MCI.ROUTE_CD = #{routeCd}
AND MCI.SEQ = #{seq}
